SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

jMusicMetaManager
Class AnalysisPreferences

java.lang.Object
  jMusicMetaManager.AnalysisPreferences

public class AnalysisPreferences
extends java.lang.Object

An object of this class holds the settings to be used when jMusicMetaManager analyzes recording metadata.

Field Summary
 int absolute_ED_threshold
          The maximum absolute edit distance permissible for two strings to be considered likely to be identical.
 boolean calculate_absolute_ED
          Whether or not the edit distance is calculated between pairs of differing values found for a field, and a threshold based on the absolute edit distance between each pair is used to determine if the values should likely in fact be the same.
 boolean calculate_proportional_ED
          Whether or not the edit distance is calculated between pairs of differing values found for a field, and a threshold based on the absolute edit distance between each pair divided by the length of the longer field is used to determine if the values should likely in fact be the same.
 boolean calculate_subset_ED
          Whether or not the edit distance is calculated between pairs of differing values found for a field, and a threshold based on the absolute edit distance between each pair minus the difference in lengths of the fields, all divided by the length of the shorter field, is used to determine if the values should likely in fact be the same.
 boolean check_word_ordering
          Whether or not a check is performed to detect possible errors in fields due to different word orderings for otherwise identical field values.
 boolean check_word_subset
          Whether or not a check is performed to detect possible errors in fields due to the words in one field's value being a subset of the words in another field's value.
 boolean convert_ands_to_ampersands
          Whether or not all incidences of " and " are converted to " & ".
 boolean convert_ings
          Whether or not all incidences of "in'" are converted to "ing".
 boolean convert_title_abbreviations
          Whether or not the following conversions are made: "Mister " to "Mr.
 int cutoff_for_artists_few_recs
          The number of recordings cutoff to use for the list of artists with only a few recordings.
 int cutoff_for_composers_few_recs
          The number of recordings cutoff to use for the list of artists with only a few recordings.
 int duration_filter_percent_max
          The maximum percentage difference between the durations of two recordings for them to be considered to be duplicates of each other.
 boolean filter_duplicates_by_album
          Whether or not pairs of recordings must have the same values in their album fields for them to be considered to be duplicates of each other.
 boolean filter_duplicates_by_artist
          Whether or not pairs of recordings must have the same values in their artist fields for them to be considered to be duplicates of each other.
 boolean filter_duplicates_by_composer
          Whether or not pairs of recordings must have the same values in their composer fields for them to be considered to be duplicates of each other.
 boolean filter_duplicates_by_duration
          Whether or not the durations of pairs of recordings are considered when determining whether they are duplicates of each other.
 boolean filter_duplicates_by_genre
          Whether or not pairs of recordings must have at least one identical value in their genre fields for them to be considered to be duplicates of each other.
 boolean ignore_case_in_edit_distances
          Whether or not edit distances are calculated with letters belonging to different cases treated as identical.
 int incoplete_albums_threshold
          The percentage of tracks present in an album below which an album will be listed as bold in the Incomplete Albums report.
 java.io.File iTunes_file
          The path of the iTunes XML file to be analyzed.
 boolean list_albums_by_artist
          Whether or not a report is generated alphabetically listing each artist present.
 boolean list_albums_by_composer
          Whether or not a report is generated alphabetically listing each composer present.
 boolean list_albums_missing_year
          Whether or not a list is generated of albums containing one or more recordings that do not have year metadata specified.
 boolean list_albums_with_duplicate_tracks
          Whether or not a list is generated of all albums with multiple tracks with the same number as well as of albums containing one or more recordings that do not have a track number specified.
 boolean list_all_non_mp3s_in_directory
          Whether or not the paths of all files found in the mp3_directory that do not end with the .mp3 or .MP3 extension are reported.
 boolean list_all_postmerge_metadata
          Whether or not all available metadata is reported for every recording after the metadata from the iTunes XML file and MP3 ID3 tags have been merged.
 boolean list_all_recordings_found
          Whether or not the path, title and artist of all recordings for which metadata is extracted is reported.
 boolean list_artists_by_genre
          Whether or not a report is generated alphabetically listing each genre present.
 boolean list_artists_with_few_recordings
          Whether or not a list of artists with only a few recordings is generated.
 boolean list_composers_by_genre
          Whether or not a report is generated alphabetically listing each genre present.
 boolean list_composers_with_few_recordings
          Whether or not a list of composers with only a few recordings is generated.
 boolean list_files_in_XML_but_missing
          Whether or not the path of each recording parsed from an iTunes XML file is checked, and a report is generated listing such files that are missing.
 boolean list_incomplete_albums
          Whether or not a report is generated listing all albums that are missing tracks, or that have an unknown number of tracks.
 boolean list_mp3_files_could_not_parse
          Whether or not a report is generated listing all MP3 files that were found but could not be parsed, and why they could not be parsed.
 boolean list_noncorresponding_fields
          Whether or not fields that differ between each MP3 file and its corresponding iTunes XML entry are reported.
 boolean list_noncorresponding_recordings
          Whether or not the recordings that are referenced in an iTunes XML file but are not present on disk (and vice versa) are reported.
 boolean list_sorted_recording_metadata
          Whether or not all available metadata is reported for every recording after the recordings have been sorted by title.
 boolean list_titles_rejected_as_equivalent
          Whether or not a report is generated listing all recordings that were filtered out of the probable duplicates report.
 java.io.File mp3_directory
          The path of a directory containing MP3 files (and/or subdirectories containing MP3s) whose ID3 tags are to be analyzed.
 boolean perform_find_replace_operations
          A gloabal control.
 int proportional_ED_threshold
          The maximum proportional edit distance permissible for two strings to be considered likely to be identical (calculated by dividing the absolute distance by the length of the longer field).
 boolean remove_brackets
          Whether or not all parentheses, square brackets and curly braces are removed.
 boolean remove_colons
          Whether or not all colons are removed.
 boolean remove_commas
          Whether or not all commas are removed.
 boolean remove_hyphens
          Whether or not all hyphens are removed.
 boolean remove_numbers_at_title_beginnings
          Whether or not all numbers and spaces at the very beginning of recording titles are removed.
 boolean remove_periods
          Whether or not all periods are removed.
 boolean remove_quotation_marks
          Whether or not all quotation marks are removed.
 boolean remove_semicolons
          Whether or not all semicolons are removed.
 boolean remove_single_quotes
          Whether or not all apostrophes and single quotes are removed.
 boolean remove_spaces
          Whether or not all spaces are removed.
 boolean remove_thes
          Whether or not all occurences of "the " are removed.
 boolean report_all_find_replace_changes
          Whether or not a report is generated detailing every change made during the find and replace operations.
 boolean report_artist_breakdown
          Whether or not a report is generated that names all unique artists and statistics about their entries in the music database.
 boolean report_comment_breakdown
          Whether or not a report is generated that names all unique comments and statistics about their entries in the music database.
 boolean report_composer_breakdown
          Whether or not a report is generated that names all unique composers and statistics about their entries in the music database.
 boolean report_differing_only_in_case
          Whether or not to report entries where otherwise identical title, artist, composer, genre and album fields differ in case.
 boolean report_edit_distances
          Whether or not a report is generated listing a table of edit distances for each pair of values for each selected field.
 boolean report_genre_breakdown
          Whether or not a report is generated that names all unique genres and statistics about their entries in the music database.
 boolean report_identical_titles
          Whether or not a list of all titles that are identical is generated.
 boolean report_missing_metadata
          Whether or not all recordings should be explicity reported that have empty title, artist, composer, album and/or genre fields.
 boolean report_new_identicals_after_fr
          Whether or not a report is generated describing all newly identical entries after the find and replace operations have been performed.
 boolean report_on_compilation_albums
          Whether or not a list of all albums marked as compilations is generated, as well as a list of albums that are not marked as compilations but contain multiple artists and a list of albums that are marked as compilations but contain only one artist.
 boolean report_options_selected
          Whether or not a list of all options selected for the run of processing and reporting is generated.
 boolean report_probable_duplicates
          Whether or not a report should be generated indicating recordings that are likely multiple occurences of the same recording under the same or different names.
 boolean report_processing_times
          Whether or not the processing times needed for each portion of the analysis should be reported.
 boolean report_starting_with_spaces
          Whether or not a list of titles, artists, composers, albums and genres that start with spaces is generated.
 boolean report_word_ordering_tests
          Whether or not a report is generated describing describing the results of the word_ordering_fraction_match and word_subset_fraction_match reports for artists, composers and genres.
 boolean report_wrongly_differing_albums
          Whether or not a report should be generated indicating all clusters of album fields whose members differ from one another, but nonetheless likely should, in fact, be identical.
 boolean report_wrongly_differing_artists
          Whether or not a report should be generated indicating all clusters of artist fields whose members differ from one another, but nonetheless likely should, in fact, be identical.
 boolean report_wrongly_differing_composers
          Whether or not a report should be generated indicating all clusters of composer fields whose members differ from one another, but nonetheless likely should, in fact, be identical.
 boolean report_wrongly_differing_genres
          Whether or not a report should be generated indicating all clusters of genre fields whose members differ from one another, but nonetheless likely should, in fact, be identical.
 boolean report_wrongly_differing_titles
          Whether or not a report should be generated indicating all clusters of title fields whose members differ from one another, but nonetheless likely should, in fact, be identical.
 java.io.File save_file
          The path to which a report file should be saved.
 int subset_ED_threshold
          The maximum subset edit distance permissible for two strings to be considered likely to be identical (calculated by subtracting the difference in length from the absolute edit distance of the two strings and dividing the result by the length of the shorter field).
 double word_ordering_fraction_match
          The minimum fraction (0.0 to 1.0) of words that must match in a check_word_ordering test in order for two fields to be reported as intended to be identical.
 double word_subset_fraction_match
          The minimum fraction (0.0 to 1.0) of words that must match in a word_subset_fraction_match test in order for two fields to be reported as intended to be identical.

Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

iTunes_file

public java.io.File iTunes_file
The path of the iTunes XML file to be analyzed. A value of null indicates that no iTunes XML file is to be analyzed.

mp3_directory

public java.io.File mp3_directory
The path of a directory containing MP3 files (and/or subdirectories containing MP3s) whose ID3 tags are to be analyzed. A value of null indicates that no ID3 tags are to be analyzed.

save_file

public java.io.File save_file
The path to which a report file should be saved. A value of null is not permitted.

perform_find_replace_operations

public boolean perform_find_replace_operations
A gloabal control. The ignore_case_in_edit_distances, convert_ands_to_ampersands, convert_ings, convert_title_abbreviations, convert_title_abbreviations, remove_thes, remove_periods, remove_commas, remove_hyphens and remove_spaces operations are only performed if this is true.

ignore_case_in_edit_distances

public boolean ignore_case_in_edit_distances
Whether or not edit distances are calculated with letters belonging to different cases treated as identical.

remove_numbers_at_title_beginnings

public boolean remove_numbers_at_title_beginnings
Whether or not all numbers and spaces at the very beginning of recording titles are removed.

convert_ings

public boolean convert_ings
Whether or not all incidences of "in'" are converted to "ing".

convert_title_abbreviations

public boolean convert_title_abbreviations
Whether or not the following conversions are made: "Mister " to "Mr. ", "Doctor " to "Dr. " and "Professor " to "Prof. ".

remove_periods

public boolean remove_periods
Whether or not all periods are removed.

remove_commas

public boolean remove_commas
Whether or not all commas are removed.

remove_hyphens

public boolean remove_hyphens
Whether or not all hyphens are removed.

remove_colons

public boolean remove_colons
Whether or not all colons are removed.

remove_semicolons

public boolean remove_semicolons
Whether or not all semicolons are removed.

remove_quotation_marks

public boolean remove_quotation_marks
Whether or not all quotation marks are removed.

remove_single_quotes

public boolean remove_single_quotes
Whether or not all apostrophes and single quotes are removed.

remove_brackets

public boolean remove_brackets
Whether or not all parentheses, square brackets and curly braces are removed.

convert_ands_to_ampersands

public boolean convert_ands_to_ampersands
Whether or not all incidences of " and " are converted to " & ".

remove_thes

public boolean remove_thes
Whether or not all occurences of "the " are removed.

remove_spaces

public boolean remove_spaces
Whether or not all spaces are removed.

check_word_ordering

public boolean check_word_ordering
Whether or not a check is performed to detect possible errors in fields due to different word orderings for otherwise identical field values.

word_ordering_fraction_match

public double word_ordering_fraction_match
The minimum fraction (0.0 to 1.0) of words that must match in a check_word_ordering test in order for two fields to be reported as intended to be identical.

check_word_subset

public boolean check_word_subset
Whether or not a check is performed to detect possible errors in fields due to the words in one field's value being a subset of the words in another field's value.

word_subset_fraction_match

public double word_subset_fraction_match
The minimum fraction (0.0 to 1.0) of words that must match in a word_subset_fraction_match test in order for two fields to be reported as intended to be identical.

calculate_absolute_ED

public boolean calculate_absolute_ED
Whether or not the edit distance is calculated between pairs of differing values found for a field, and a threshold based on the absolute edit distance between each pair is used to determine if the values should likely in fact be the same.

absolute_ED_threshold

public int absolute_ED_threshold
The maximum absolute edit distance permissible for two strings to be considered likely to be identical. Related to the calculate_absolute_ED field.

calculate_proportional_ED

public boolean calculate_proportional_ED
Whether or not the edit distance is calculated between pairs of differing values found for a field, and a threshold based on the absolute edit distance between each pair divided by the length of the longer field is used to determine if the values should likely in fact be the same.

proportional_ED_threshold

public int proportional_ED_threshold
The maximum proportional edit distance permissible for two strings to be considered likely to be identical (calculated by dividing the absolute distance by the length of the longer field). Related to the calculate_proportional_ED field.

calculate_subset_ED

public boolean calculate_subset_ED
Whether or not the edit distance is calculated between pairs of differing values found for a field, and a threshold based on the absolute edit distance between each pair minus the difference in lengths of the fields, all divided by the length of the shorter field, is used to determine if the values should likely in fact be the same.

subset_ED_threshold

public int subset_ED_threshold
The maximum subset edit distance permissible for two strings to be considered likely to be identical (calculated by subtracting the difference in length from the absolute edit distance of the two strings and dividing the result by the length of the shorter field). Related to the calculate_proportional_ED calculate_subset_ED.

filter_duplicates_by_duration

public boolean filter_duplicates_by_duration
Whether or not the durations of pairs of recordings are considered when determining whether they are duplicates of each other.

duration_filter_percent_max

public int duration_filter_percent_max
The maximum percentage difference between the durations of two recordings for them to be considered to be duplicates of each other. Must be from 0 to 100.

filter_duplicates_by_artist

public boolean filter_duplicates_by_artist
Whether or not pairs of recordings must have the same values in their artist fields for them to be considered to be duplicates of each other.

filter_duplicates_by_composer

public boolean filter_duplicates_by_composer
Whether or not pairs of recordings must have the same values in their composer fields for them to be considered to be duplicates of each other.

filter_duplicates_by_genre

public boolean filter_duplicates_by_genre
Whether or not pairs of recordings must have at least one identical value in their genre fields for them to be considered to be duplicates of each other.

filter_duplicates_by_album

public boolean filter_duplicates_by_album
Whether or not pairs of recordings must have the same values in their album fields for them to be considered to be duplicates of each other.

list_mp3_files_could_not_parse

public boolean list_mp3_files_could_not_parse
Whether or not a report is generated listing all MP3 files that were found but could not be parsed, and why they could not be parsed.

list_all_non_mp3s_in_directory

public boolean list_all_non_mp3s_in_directory
Whether or not the paths of all files found in the mp3_directory that do not end with the .mp3 or .MP3 extension are reported.

list_all_recordings_found

public boolean list_all_recordings_found
Whether or not the path, title and artist of all recordings for which metadata is extracted is reported. Two separate lists are produced, one for the recordings extracted from ID3 tags and one for recordings extracted from an iTunes XML file.

list_files_in_XML_but_missing

public boolean list_files_in_XML_but_missing
Whether or not the path of each recording parsed from an iTunes XML file is checked, and a report is generated listing such files that are missing.

list_noncorresponding_recordings

public boolean list_noncorresponding_recordings
Whether or not the recordings that are referenced in an iTunes XML file but are not present on disk (and vice versa) are reported. This is only meaningful if both an iTunes XML file and an MP3 directory are specified by the user.

list_noncorresponding_fields

public boolean list_noncorresponding_fields
Whether or not fields that differ between each MP3 file and its corresponding iTunes XML entry are reported. This is only meaningful if both an iTunes XML file and an MP3 directory are specified by the user.

list_all_postmerge_metadata

public boolean list_all_postmerge_metadata
Whether or not all available metadata is reported for every recording after the metadata from the iTunes XML file and MP3 ID3 tags have been merged. This is generally used only for testing, as it is largely redundant if the list_sorted_recording_metadata option is selected.

list_sorted_recording_metadata

public boolean list_sorted_recording_metadata
Whether or not all available metadata is reported for every recording after the recordings have been sorted by title.

report_artist_breakdown

public boolean report_artist_breakdown
Whether or not a report is generated that names all unique artists and statistics about their entries in the music database.

report_composer_breakdown

public boolean report_composer_breakdown
Whether or not a report is generated that names all unique composers and statistics about their entries in the music database.

report_genre_breakdown

public boolean report_genre_breakdown
Whether or not a report is generated that names all unique genres and statistics about their entries in the music database.

report_comment_breakdown

public boolean report_comment_breakdown
Whether or not a report is generated that names all unique comments and statistics about their entries in the music database.

list_artists_by_genre

public boolean list_artists_by_genre
Whether or not a report is generated alphabetically listing each genre present. All artists present that have at least one recording in a given genre are listed under that genre's entry as well as the number of recordings by the artist belonging to the given genre and the percentage of the recordings in that genre that they represent.

list_composers_by_genre

public boolean list_composers_by_genre
Whether or not a report is generated alphabetically listing each genre present. All composers present that have at least one recording in a given genre are listed under that genre's entry as well as the number of recordings by the composer belonging to the given genre and the percentage of the recordings in that genre that they represent.

report_missing_metadata

public boolean report_missing_metadata
Whether or not all recordings should be explicity reported that have empty title, artist, composer, album and/or genre fields. A separate table is produced for each of these.

list_artists_with_few_recordings

public boolean list_artists_with_few_recordings
Whether or not a list of artists with only a few recordings is generated.

cutoff_for_artists_few_recs

public int cutoff_for_artists_few_recs
The number of recordings cutoff to use for the list of artists with only a few recordings.

list_composers_with_few_recordings

public boolean list_composers_with_few_recordings
Whether or not a list of composers with only a few recordings is generated.

cutoff_for_composers_few_recs

public int cutoff_for_composers_few_recs
The number of recordings cutoff to use for the list of artists with only a few recordings.

report_identical_titles

public boolean report_identical_titles
Whether or not a list of all titles that are identical is generated.

report_starting_with_spaces

public boolean report_starting_with_spaces
Whether or not a list of titles, artists, composers, albums and genres that start with spaces is generated.

list_albums_by_artist

public boolean list_albums_by_artist
Whether or not a report is generated alphabetically listing each artist present. All albums present that have at least one recording by a given artist are listed under that artist's entry. Note is also made of whether each album is a compilation, how many tracks in each album are by the corresponding artist and how many tracks belonging to each album are present.

list_albums_by_composer

public boolean list_albums_by_composer
Whether or not a report is generated alphabetically listing each composer present. All albums present that have at least one recording by a given composer are listed under that composer's entry. Note is also made of whether each album is a compilation, how many tracks in each album are by the corresponding composer and how many tracks belonging to each album are present.

list_incomplete_albums

public boolean list_incomplete_albums
Whether or not a report is generated listing all albums that are missing tracks, or that have an unknown number of tracks.

incoplete_albums_threshold

public int incoplete_albums_threshold
The percentage of tracks present in an album below which an album will be listed as bold in the Incomplete Albums report.

list_albums_with_duplicate_tracks

public boolean list_albums_with_duplicate_tracks
Whether or not a list is generated of all albums with multiple tracks with the same number as well as of albums containing one or more recordings that do not have a track number specified.

list_albums_missing_year

public boolean list_albums_missing_year
Whether or not a list is generated of albums containing one or more recordings that do not have year metadata specified.

report_on_compilation_albums

public boolean report_on_compilation_albums
Whether or not a list of all albums marked as compilations is generated, as well as a list of albums that are not marked as compilations but contain multiple artists and a list of albums that are marked as compilations but contain only one artist.

report_differing_only_in_case

public boolean report_differing_only_in_case
Whether or not to report entries where otherwise identical title, artist, composer, genre and album fields differ in case.

report_all_find_replace_changes

public boolean report_all_find_replace_changes
Whether or not a report is generated detailing every change made during the find and replace operations.

report_new_identicals_after_fr

public boolean report_new_identicals_after_fr
Whether or not a report is generated describing all newly identical entries after the find and replace operations have been performed.

report_word_ordering_tests

public boolean report_word_ordering_tests
Whether or not a report is generated describing describing the results of the word_ordering_fraction_match and word_subset_fraction_match reports for artists, composers and genres.

report_edit_distances

public boolean report_edit_distances
Whether or not a report is generated listing a table of edit distances for each pair of values for each selected field.

list_titles_rejected_as_equivalent

public boolean list_titles_rejected_as_equivalent
Whether or not a report is generated listing all recordings that were filtered out of the probable duplicates report.

report_probable_duplicates

public boolean report_probable_duplicates
Whether or not a report should be generated indicating recordings that are likely multiple occurences of the same recording under the same or different names.

report_wrongly_differing_titles

public boolean report_wrongly_differing_titles
Whether or not a report should be generated indicating all clusters of title fields whose members differ from one another, but nonetheless likely should, in fact, be identical.

report_wrongly_differing_artists

public boolean report_wrongly_differing_artists
Whether or not a report should be generated indicating all clusters of artist fields whose members differ from one another, but nonetheless likely should, in fact, be identical.

report_wrongly_differing_composers

public boolean report_wrongly_differing_composers
Whether or not a report should be generated indicating all clusters of composer fields whose members differ from one another, but nonetheless likely should, in fact, be identical.

report_wrongly_differing_albums

public boolean report_wrongly_differing_albums
Whether or not a report should be generated indicating all clusters of album fields whose members differ from one another, but nonetheless likely should, in fact, be identical.

report_wrongly_differing_genres

public boolean report_wrongly_differing_genres
Whether or not a report should be generated indicating all clusters of genre fields whose members differ from one another, but nonetheless likely should, in fact, be identical.

report_options_selected

public boolean report_options_selected
Whether or not a list of all options selected for the run of processing and reporting is generated.

report_processing_times

public boolean report_processing_times
Whether or not the processing times needed for each portion of the analysis should be reported.

                    throws java.lang.Exception
Creates a new instance of AnalysisPreferences with the given preferences and validates the supplied paramters.

Parameters:
iTunes_path - Used to set the iTunes_file field. A value of "" indicates that no iTunes file is to be analyzed.
mp3_path - Used to set the mp3_directory field. A value of "" indicates that no MP3 files are to be analyzed.
save_path - Used to set the save_file field. A value of "" is not permitted.
perform_find_replace_operations - Sets the corresponding field.
ignore_case_in_edit_distances - Sets the corresponding field.
remove_numbers_at_title_beginnings - Wets the corresponding field.
